oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Street Scene, Fourth Avenue North at Church Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Noel Hotel, located at Fourth Avenue North and Church Street, opened in 1930 and continued as a hotel until 1972. After the hotel closed, the building was renovated and has since housed various businesses. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Noel Hotel
Business; Tourism; Capital City; Architecture; Buildings
Nashville (Tenn.); Fourth Avenue North; church Street
